mapper.select: SELECT ra.RANSOM_CODE ransomCode, ra.CASE_CODE caseCode, ra.RANSOM_STATUS ransomStatus, ra.CREATE_USER financial, ra.BORRO_MONEY borrowMoney, ra.BORROWER_NAME borrowName, ra.BORROWER_TEL borrowTel, pro.PROPERTY_ADDR addr, ra.COM_ORG_CODE comOrgCode, (SELECT FIN_ORG_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG WHERE FIN_ORG_CODE = ra.COM_ORG_CODE) comOrgName, cai.AGENT_NAME agentName, cai.AGENT_PHONE agentPhone, cas.LEADING_PROCESS_ID leadingProcessId, app.LOANOFFICER credit FROM sctrans.T_RA_CASE ra INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE cas ON ra.CASE_CODE = cas.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO pro ON ra.CASE_CODE = pro.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO cai ON ra.CASE_CODE = cai.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_APPLY app ON ra.RANSOM_CODE = app.RANSOM_CODE WHERE ra.RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT distinct(ra.RANSOM_CODE) ransomCode, ra.CASE_CODE caseCode, ra.CREATE_USER financial, ra.BORRO_MONEY borrowMoney, ra.BORROWER_NAME borrowName, ra.BORROWER_TEL borrowTel, pro.PROPERTY_ADDR addr, ra.COM_ORG_CODE comOrgCode, (SELECT FIN_ORG_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG WHERE FIN_ORG_CODE = ra.COM_ORG_CODE) comOrgName, app.LOANOFFICER credit, cai.AGENT_NAME agentName, cai.AGENT_PHONE agentPhone, cas.LEADING_PROCESS_ID leadingProcessId, vie.INTERVIEW_MONEY interViewMoney, vie.INTEREST interest, vie.IS_ENTRUST isEntrust, tai.SIGN_TIME signTime, tai.PLAN_TIME planTime, app.APPLY_TIME applyTime, vie.INTERVIEW_TIME intervalTime, rep.REPAY_TIME repayTime, can.CANCEL_TIME cancleTime, red.REDEEM_TIME redeemTime, pay.PAYMENT_TIME paymentTime FROM sctrans.T_RA_CASE ra INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE cas ON ra.CASE_CODE = cas.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO pro ON ra.CASE_CODE = pro.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO cai ON ra.CASE_CODE = cai.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_TAILINS tai ON ra.RANSOM_CODE = tai.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_INTERVIEW vie ON ra.RANSOM_CODE = vie.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_APPLY app ON ra.RANSOM_CODE = app.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REPAY rep ON rep.RANSOM_CODE = app.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_CANCEL can ON rep.RANSOM_CODE = can.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REDEEM red ON can.RANSOM_CODE = red.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_PAYMENT pay ON pay.RANSOM_CODE = red.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE_PARTICIPANT part ON ra.CASE_CODE = part.CASE_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND ra.CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT distinct(ra.RANSOM_CODE) ransomCode, ra.CASE_CODE caseCode, ra.CREATE_USER financial, ra.BORRO_MONEY borrowMoney, ra.BORROWER_NAME borrowName, ra.BORROWER_TEL borrowTel, pro.PROPERTY_ADDR addr, ra.COM_ORG_CODE comOrgCode, (SELECT FIN_ORG_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG WHERE FIN_ORG_CODE = ra.COM_ORG_CODE) comOrgName, app.LOANOFFICER credit, cai.AGENT_NAME agentName, cai.AGENT_PHONE agentPhone, cas.LEADING_PROCESS_ID leadingProcessId, vie.INTERVIEW_MONEY interViewMoney, vie.INTEREST interest, vie.IS_ENTRUST isEntrust, tai.SIGN_TIME signTime, tai.PLAN_TIME planTime, app.APPLY_TIME applyTime, vie.INTERVIEW_TIME intervalTime, rep.REPAY_TIME repayTime, can.CANCEL_TIME cancleTime, red.REDEEM_TIME redeemTime, pay.PAYMENT_TIME paymentTime FROM sctrans.T_RA_CASE ra INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE cas ON ra.CASE_CODE = cas.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO pro ON ra.CASE_CODE = pro.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO cai ON ra.CASE_CODE = cai.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_TAILINS tai ON ra.RANSOM_CODE = tai.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_INTERVIEW vie ON ra.RANSOM_CODE = vie.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_APPLY app ON ra.RANSOM_CODE = app.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REPAY rep ON rep.RANSOM_CODE = app.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_CANCEL can ON rep.RANSOM_CODE = can.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REDEEM red ON can.RANSOM_CODE = red.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_PAYMENT pay ON pay.RANSOM_CODE = red.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE_PARTICIPANT part ON ra.CASE_CODE = part.CASE_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND ra.CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ra.RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT RANSOM_CODE ransomCode, CASE_CODE caseCode, RANSOM_STATUS ransomStatus, RANSOM_PROPERTY ransomProperty, COM_ORG_CODE comOrgCode, BORRO_MONEY borroMoney, BORROWER_NAME borrowerName, BORROWER_TEL borrowerTel, ISSTOP isstop, STOP_TYPE stopType, STOP_REASON stopReason, ACCEPT_TIME acceptTime, CREATE_TIME createTime, CREATE_USER createUser, UPDATE_TIME updateTime, UPDATE_USER updateUser, REMARK remark, FIN_ORG_ID finOrgId FROM sctrans.T_RA_CASE WHERE RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT act.TASK_DEF_KEY_ taskProperty, cas.RANSOM_CODE ransomCode, cas.CASE_CODE caseCode, cas.RANSOM_STATUS ransomStatus, cas.RANSOM_PROPERTY ransomProperty, cas.COM_ORG_CODE comOrgCode, cas.BORRO_MONEY borroMoney, cas.BORROWER_NAME borrowerName, cas.BORROWER_TEL borrowerTel, cas.ISSTOP isstop, cas.STOP_TYPE stopType, cas.STOP_REASON stopReason, cas.ACCEPT_TIME acceptTime, cas.CREATE_TIME createTime, cas.CREATE_USER createUser, cas.UPDATE_TIME updateTime, cas.UPDATE_USER updateUser, cas.REMARK remark, cas.FIN_ORG_ID finOrgId FROM sctrans.T_RA_CASE cas LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_WORKFLOW tw ON cas.RANSOM_CODE =tw.BIZ_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.ACT_RU_TASK act ON tw.INST_CODE = act.PROC_INST_ID_ WHERE tw.BIZ_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT rap.PART_CODE partCode, rap.EST_PART_TIME estPartTime, cas.CREATE_TIME createTime FROM sctrans.T_RA_PLAN rap INNER JOIN sctrans.T_RA_CASE cas ON rap.RANSOM_CODE = cas.RANSOM_CODE

SELECT CASE_CODE caseCode, RANSOM_CODE ransomCode, FIN_ORG_CODE finOrgCode, MORTGAGE_TYPE mortgageType, DIYA_TYPE diyaType, LOAN_MONEY loanMoney, REST_MONEY restMoney, SIGN_TIME signTime, PLAN_TIME planTime FROM sctrans.T_RA_TAILINS WHERE CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT CASE_CODE caseCode, RANSOM_CODE ransomCode, FIN_ORG_CODE finOrgCode, MORTGAGE_TYPE mortgageType, DIYA_TYPE diyaType, LOAN_MONEY loanMoney, REST_MONEY restMoney, SIGN_TIME signTime, PLAN_TIME planTime FROM sctrans.T_RA_TAILINS WHERE RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT APPLY_TIME applyTime,PART_CODE partCode FROM sctrans.T_RA_APPLY WHERE RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT INTERVIEW_TIME signTime,PART_CODE partCode FROM sctrans.T_RA_INTERVIEW WHERE RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT REPAY_TIME mortgageTime,PART_CODE partCode FROM sctrans.T_RA_REPAY WHERE RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PART_CODE = 'PAYLOAN_ONE'
SELECT CANCEL_TIME cancelTime,PART_CODE partCode FROM sctrans.T_RA_CANCEL WHERE RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PART_CODE = 'CANCELDIYA_ONE'
SELECT REDEEM_TIME redeemTime,PART_CODE partCode FROM sctrans.T_RA_REDEEM WHERE RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PART_CODE = 'RECEIVE_ONE'
SELECT PAYMENT_TIME paymentTime,PART_CODE partCode FROM sctrans.T_RA_PAYMENT WHERE RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT RANSOM_CODE ransomCode, PART_CODE partCode, EST_PART_TIME estPartTime FROM sctrans.T_RA_PLAN WHERE PART_CODE IN('APPLY','SIGN','PAYLOAN_ONE','CANCELDIYA_ONE','RECEIVE_ONE','PAYCLEAR') AND RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
SELECT @@IDENTITY
insert into sctrans.T_RA_APPLY
RANSOM_CODE,
PART_CODE,
APPLY_USER,
APPLY_TIME,
APPLY_ORG_CODE,
LOANOFFICER,
UPDATE_USER,
UPDATE_TIME,
CREATE_USER,
CREATE_TIME
#{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{applyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{applyOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{loanOfficer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
#{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
mapper.update:
UPDATE sctrans.T_RA_CASE SET COM_ORG_CODE = #{applyOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sctrans.T_RA_TAILINS WHERE RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DIYA_TYPE = '710150002'
mapper.insert:

mapper.update: UPDATE sctrans.T_RA_CASE SET RANSOM_STATUS = 3 WHERE RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UPDATE sctrans.T_RA_CASE SET RANSOM_STATUS = 2 WHERE RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT 1 FROM sctrans.T_RA_PLAN WHERE RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PART_CODE = #{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update sctrans.T_RA_PLAN
PART_CODE = #{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EST_PART_TIME = #{estPartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
WHERE RANSOM_CODE = #{ransomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PART_CODE = #{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
